item.title: Bruteforcing Cyberoam
item.description: This post is about how me and Avijit retrieved multiplie cyberoam username/password combinations using python. This also highlights how vulnerable the system is if you are not using a more secure password . Even the default password given to us by the College are being recycled for many years. DISCLAIMER Before you read this, I want to clarify that we do not intend to use our findings in any unethical way.
